help.title: Help
help.subtitle: How can we help you?
help.findAnswers: Find answers to frequently asked questions or contact us

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions
faq.createAccountQuestion: How do I create an account?
faq.createAccountAnswer: Click 'Sign Up' and follow the registration steps. You can register as a client or professional.
faq.postJobQuestion: How do I post a job?
faq.postJobAnswer: Click 'Post a Job', fill in the details about your project, and publish it to receive proposals.
faq.becomeProQuestion: How do I become a professional?
faq.becomeProAnswer: Register as a professional, complete your profile with portfolio and skills, and start receiving jobs.
faq.submitProposalQuestion: How do I submit a proposal?
faq.submitProposalAnswer: Find a job that matches your skills, click 'Submit Proposal', and describe why you're the best fit.
faq.editProfileQuestion: How do I edit my profile?
faq.editProfileAnswer: Go to Settings and update your profile information, photo, and other details.
faq.contactSupportAnswer: Use the help center to create a support ticket or email us directly.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy.introText: At Homico.ge, we value your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.byUsing: By using our platform, you agree to the practices described in this privacy policy.
privacy.weCollect: We collect the following types of information:
privacy.weUseFor: We use your information for the following purposes:
privacy.weMayShare: We may share your information with:
privacy.neverSell: We never sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.weUseCookies: We use cookies and similar technologies:
privacy.manageCookies: You can manage cookie settings through your browser.
privacy.children: Homico is not intended for persons under 18 years of age.
privacy.dataMayProcess: Your data may be processed outside of Georgia.
privacy.mayUpdate: We may periodically update this policy.

about.heroBlurb: Homico is Georgia's premier platform connecting clients with verified home service professionals.
about.contactBlurb: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you.
about.missionBlurb: Our goal is to make finding and hiring trusted professionals in Georgia simple and reliable. We're building a platform where quality, trust, and professionalism come first.

trustTransparency.title: Trust & Transparency
trustTransparency.description: We verify professionals and enable honest reviews so you can make informed decisions.

qualityFirst.title: Quality First
qualityFirst.description: We partner with skilled professionals who take pride in their craft and deliver excellence.

communityFocus.title: Community Focus
communityFocus.description: We support local professionals and help communities thrive by connecting people who need work done.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our platform to make finding and hiring professionals easier than ever.

analyzer.title: Estimate Analyzer
analyzer.description: Upload a contractor estimate and get AI-powered detailed analysis. Find out what's a fair price and what's not.

prices.description: Search 100+ renovation work market prices in Tbilisi. Updated prices for 2024.

calculator.description: Calculate estimated budget based on your apartment parameters. Get detailed estimates in minutes.

compare.title: Compare Estimates
compare.description: Compare up to 5 contractor quotes and find the best deal. See detailed side-by-side comparison.

analyzer.title: Estimate Analyzer
analyzer.subtitle: Upload a contractor estimate and get detailed analysis
analyzer.uploadSubtitle: Drop file here or click to upload
analyzer.textPlaceholder:
Paste the contractor's estimate text here...

Example:
Electrical points (56 pcs) - 60₾ each = 3,360₾
Electrical panel - 450₾
Plastering (120 sqm) - 35₾/sqm = 4,200₾

errors.analysisError: Failed to analyze estimate. Please try again.
errors.imageNotSupported: Image files are not yet supported. Please use Excel or PDF, or paste the text directly.
errors.noTextExtracted: Could not extract text from the file. Please try a different file or paste the text directly.
